name: Spell Recipes
description: Spells are a way of channeling magic through a staff, using quantity of $(l:herbs)herbs$() as a reagent, to achieve change to yourself, to those around you, or to the world.$(br2)$(warning) You will need to store the required components (listed in every entry) in a special $(apparatus/component_pouch)pouch$() in order to cast spells.
